title: Help! Can anyone ID this font? Please?
content:
Restaurant logo, i'm looking to remake & resize it however I can't find the font :( any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1291830758\_m\_1280777469\_m\_jojo bw logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061212/http:/typophile.com/files/1291830758_m_1280777469_m_jojo%20bw%20logo.gif) | 3.84 KB |
author: KLove11

comments.content: It must be based on **[Republik Serif ICG (03)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061212/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Image-Club-Graphics&ffam=Republik%20Serif%20ICG%20-%2003&fid=4ba5ab36eefc2571113601c2cb0a5ded&fsize=60&text=JOJO&fit=1)** by Image Club Graphics
